EmailTemplate.name: Email 5: Dreampass REVOKED
EmailTemplate.subject: [ACTION REQUIRED]: Your Davos Dreampass has expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To help ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Because we have not received documentation of your onsite PCR test within 24hrs of check in, your Dreampass has expired.
Action Required: Please stop by the Salesforce Welcome center to get an onsite COVID-19 PCR test. This will re-activate your Dreampass. The Salesforce Welcome Center is located at: 81 Promenade, Davos Platz * Monday - Tuesday from 6:30 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. CET * Wednesday from 6:30 a.m. - 11:59 p.m. CET
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
